overview: This is a sweet family story about a child and her first day at the nursery. In the morning, PP Daddy doesn't want to get up, and feels a little annoyed by his baby’s energy. On their way to the nursery, the family will feel the impact of a recent typhoon which is still causing havoc. As they overcome the hurdles and arrive at school, the child is reluctant to stay in a strange place, triggering PP’s memories of the early days spent with the baby.
title: PP Goes to the Nursery
